title: DomainDemo
msg: A dataset linking domains shared on Twitter (X) with the demographic characteristics of associated users, including age, gender, race, political affiliation, and geolocation, from 2011 to 2022.

title: A List of News Domains
msg: A canonical compilation of U.S. news domains aggregated from multiple existing datasets, designed for researchers studying news consumption and media bias.

title: CoVaxxy
msg: A growing collection of English-language Twitter posts about COVID-19 vaccines, with a dashboard for visualizing the relationship between vaccine adoption and geo-located posts.

title: MEIU22
msg: A multi-platform collection of social media posts about the 2022 U.S. Midterm Elections from Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Reddit, and 4chan.
